Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Jefferson Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Jefferson Park. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/65th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, Marquette, Cottage Grove, 61st, and King Drive due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, Marquette, Cottage Grove, 61st, and King Drive due to street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.
